snippet.title: POPGOES Arcade Premium - Clip #3 - "Surprise Battle"
snippet.description:
Wishlist POPGOES Arcade on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1986840/POPGOES_Arcade/

If you count all variants, like the "Plus", "Dead", and "Gilded" types, then the original POPGOES Arcade game has 38 enemies in total... POPGOES and The Machinist, by itself, has over 40. 

And one of these new foes is called the Scrapbot - a robotic mimic of the new Scrap Coin that hides in the overworld with very high attack power. You can't escape from battles with these robots, but maybe there's a way to tell which coins are fake before you touch them...?

These clips were made for Dawko's WWF Charity Stream: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MfC024iDNqg

POPGOES Arcade: https://gamejolt.com/games/arcade/478668

Join my membership to access my Discord server and check out exclusive content: https://www.buymeacoffee.com/kanecarter
